summary: A young woman pretends to be pregnant in order to avoid being fired from her job. When that gets her special treatment by everyone involved in her life, she tries to keep up the lie for nine months.
cast: Lindsay Lohan|Luke Kirby|Chris Parnell|Aaron Yoo|Bridgit Mendler|Tracee Ellis Ross|Kevin Covais|Bonnie Somerville|Cheryl Hines|Creed Bratton|Janeane Garofalo|Keiko Agena|Donald V. Allen|Jack Axelrod|Alexandra Barreto|Jenni Blong|Shirly Brener|Christa Campbell|Maree Cheatham|Pat Crawford Brown|Darcy DeMoss|D.C. Douglas|Pete Gardner|Willie Garson|Michelle Gillette|Belen Greene|Sarah Hernandez|Ethan Kent|Gavin Kent|Tarri Markel|Amber Alexander|Laura Liguori|James Tappan|Claire Risoli|Ana Ortiz|Barry Papick|Nayan Raina|Lonny Ross|Marc Senter|Caitlin Short|Jessica St. Clair|Jay Thomas|Yuki Bird|Brendan Bradley|Amanda Carrier|Aurelius DiBarsanti|Keith Rhoades|Jennifer Wydra|Robert Zimiga
title: Un trabajo embarazoso
